sections.heading: Overview
content: Ephraim K. Brenman, DO, is a practicing physiatrist in Texas.

Brenman graduated from the University of Health Sciences College of Osteopathic Medicine, Kansas City, Missouri.  He then completed his residency in physical medicine and rehabilitation at Northwestern University Medical School, Chicago, Ill.
Brenman is a member of the American Academy of Physical Medicine and Rehabilitation, the American Osteopathic College of Rehabilitation Medicine, and the Texas Medical Association.
He is board certified by the American Board of Physical Medicine and Rehabilitation.
Brenman is a physician reviewer for Physicians' Review Network, Inc., an independent medical review organization.
